a93a56d0-a370-44d6-bb60-9374845064dc.description: Earners of the NetBackup 8.3: Maintenance and Troubleshooting badge are trained to troubleshoot Veritas NetBackup software. They are competent in skills such as using error detection tools and troubleshooting methodologies. They are able to resolve issues related to the NetBackup database, devices, media, disk, cloud, OST, deduplication, and virtualization. In addition, they know the functions of key NetBackup processes and how to enable, view, and manage the associated logs.
